response_parsed.title: Containerizing Serverless Handlers using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide explains how to containerize serverless functions using FastAPI, a modern, high-performance web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Using Docker and FastAPI together allows for easy deployment of serverless handlers.
FastAPI provides advanced features like automatic documentation generation, type hints, and robust error handling.
Python 3.12+ is required to benefit from enhanced performance improvements in the latest iteration of Python.
version_notes: The example provided is based on the latest version of FastAPI (0.73.0) and Docker.
Python 3.12+ support was introduced in FastAPI 0.69.0.
caveats: Ensure that you have Docker installed on your system before attempting to build the container.
Proper environment configuration is essential for a successful deployment.
